title: OXO Candy and Deep Fry Thermometer
description: Making candy is sweeter with the OXO Good Grips Candy and Deep Fry Thermometer. This glass Thermometer is offset to allow for large, easy-to-read graphics, which include temperature ranges for different candy types. The measurement markings temperature within two degrees in F and C for accuracy. The convenient clip is extra long to make it easy to attach, remove or adjust, and the rounded foot helps prevent scratching on the sides or bottom of your pot. The large opening in the handle allows you to lift the Candy and Deep Fry Thermometer out of the pot using a utensil, and the durable, stainless steel body is easy to clean. This Thermometer isn’t just for candy! It’s also great for measuring oil temperature for deep frying, and for making jellies and jams.

asset.author: OXO
asset.hookText:

Making candy is sweeter with the OXO Good Grips Candy and Deep Fry Thermometer. This glass Thermometer is offset to allow for large, easy-to-read graphics, which include temperature ranges for different candy types. The measurement markings temperature within two degrees in F and C for accuracy. The convenient clip is extra long to make it easy to attach, remove or adjust, and the rounded foot helps prevent scratching on the sides or bottom of your pot. The large opening in the handle allows you to lift the Candy and Deep Fry Thermometer out of the pot using a utensil, and the durable, stainless steel body is easy to clean. This Thermometer isn’t just for candy! It’s also great for measuring oil temperature for deep frying, and for making jellies and jams.

transcripts: At OXO we have a lot of people with a lot of different personalities but the one thing that we all agree on, is that we all have a sweet tooth. We wanted to make a candy thermometer that was a easy to use for the widest range of people. Making candy is sweeter with the OXO candy and deep fry thermometer, this glass thermometer is off set to allow for large easy to read graphics. Which include temperature ranges for really important candy measurements. The measurements markings are within two degrees Fahrenheit and Celsius for accuracy. The convenient clip on the back is extra long to make it easy to attach, remove or adjust and the rounded foot helps prevent scratching on the sides or bottom of your pot. The large opening in the handle allows you to lift the candy and deep fry thermometer out of the pot using an utensil. And the durable stainless steel body is easy to clean. This thermometer isn't just for candy it's also great for measuring oil temperature for deep frying and for making jellys and jam. Here's a good tip, while testing the thermometer our baking team made batches of marshmallow, caramels, pralines, and homemade cracker jacks. It's a tough job but somebody had to do it.
